doc:
Joshua Jackson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joshua_Jackson 0 Joshua Browning Carter Jackson (born June 11, 1978) is a Canadian actor. He has appeared in primetime television and in over 30 film roles. His well-known roles include Pacey Witter in Dawson's Creek, Charlie Conway in The Mighty Ducks film series, Peter Bishop in Fringe, and Cole Lockhart in The Affair. Jackson won the Genie Award for Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role for his performance in the Canadian independent film One Week. Joshua_Browning_Carter_Jackson ( born June_11_,_1978 ) is a_Canadian_actor . He has_appeared in primetime_television and in over_30_film_roles . His_well-known_roles include Pacey_Witter in Dawson 's_Creek , Charlie_Conway in The_Mighty_Ducks_film_series , Peter_Bishop in Fringe , and Cole_Lockhart in The_Affair . Jackson won the_Genie_Award for Best Performance by an_Actor in a_Leading_Role for his_performance in the_Canadian_independent_film One_Week .
